EmailTemplate.description: An email is sent to the program notifying that their change of administrator request has been submitted
EmailTemplate.name: COA Amendment Request Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Administrator Submitted for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_OOS_Program_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A Change of Administrator amendment request was successfully submitted on {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Submission_Date__c} for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_OOS_Program_Number__c} The requested change will not take effect until it has been approved.
To view the details of this request, log into OCLQS. (insert OCLQS log in link) Select the “ Licensing Amendment“ tab under My programs screen and then the Amendment Activities tab.
Contact the Child Care Help Desk for additional assistance at 1-877-302-2347.
The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team.
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
